Plant Description: Known for its long, upright leaves with striking patterns.

Plant Description: Glossy, dark green leaves that are extremely low maintenance.

Plant Description: Heart-shaped leaves that come in various shades of green and variegations.

Care Requirements.Watering: Keep soil consistently moist but not soggy

Plant Description: Large, lush leaves that can vary greatly in shape and color depending on the species.

Care Requirements.Watering: Keep soil evenly moist, avoid overwatering

Care Requirements.Watering: Keep soil evenly moist, avoid overwatering

Plant Description: Dark green leaves with white flowers that are often mistaken for petals.

Care Requirements.Watering: Keep soil consistently moist, do not overwater

Plant Description: Known for their intricately patterned leaves that often feature striking combinations of colors.
